description.ruby-sapphire:
Alters the POKéMON’s type
depending on the location.
description.emerald:
Alters the POKéMON’s type
depending on the location.
description.firered-leafgreen:
Alters the user’s
type depending on
the location’s
terrain.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user’s type is
changed depending on
its environment, such
as at water’s edge, in
grass, or in a cave.

description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full:
User's type changes according to the terrain.

Terrain        | New type
-------------- | --------------
Building       | normal
Cave           | rock
Desert         | ground
Grass          | grass
Mountain       | rock
Ocean          | water
Pond           | water
Road           | ground
Snow           | ice
Tall grass     | grass

In Pokémon Battle Revolution:

Terrain        | New type
-------------- | --------------
Courtyard      | normal
Crystal        | rock
Gateway        | water
Magma          | rock
Main Street    | normal
Neon           | normal
Stargazer      | rock
Sunny Park     | grass
Sunset         | ground
Waterfall      | grass
effect.shortEffect: User's type changes to match the terrain.
